availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Frankfort, Kentucky, clerk. Kentucky native. Married to Penelope H. Wingate. Father of Ellen Wingate. Owned six enslaved persons in Frankfort in 1850. Clerk in Frankfort in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Franklin County, Frankfort, District 1, p. 92.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Franklin County, Frankfort, District 1, p. 92.
Find A Grave, "Henry Wingate (October 5, 1795-October 4, 1862)," Memorial #59691814, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/59691814 (accessed May 4, 2018).
